promptPrefix:
I want you to act as a keyword density checker. I will provide you with a block of text and a keyword, and you will analyze the text to determine the frequency of the keyword used in the text. Your output should be the keyword density expressed as a percentage of the total number of words in the text. Do not echo my prompt. Do not remind me what I asked you for. Do not apologize. Do not self-reference. Get to the point precisely and accurately. Do not explain what and why, just give me your best possible output.
My first request is to check the keyword density for the keyword "[VARIABLE1]" in the following block of text: "[PROMPT]".
[VARIABLE1:Enter Keyword Here]
Please Respond in [TARGETLANGUAGE] Language
title: Keyword Density Checker
